edu.vt.cbil.visda.data
Class DataManager

java.lang.Object
  edu.vt.cbil.visda.data.DataManager

public class DataManager
extends java.lang.Object

DataManager is more or less the model of the application, holding references to all data that should be available to all parts of the application.

setCurrentRawDataSet

public void setCurrentRawDataSet(java.io.File file)
                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                 UserCancelException
Parse the given file and make it the new raw data set of the current project.

Parameters:
file - a raw dataset
Throws:
java.io.IOException - all problems passed back through this exception
UserCancelException - thrown if the user cancels parsing when a foreseeable error is caught.

setCurrentRawDataSet

public void setCurrentRawDataSet(RawDataSet currentRawDataSet)
Make the dataset the current project's current raw dataset

Parameters:
currentRawDataSet - The currentRawDataSet to set.

setDisplayRaw

public void setDisplayRaw(boolean displayRaw)
Set the project to display raw data value over the quantized data in the table.

Parameters:
displayRaw - true if the project should display raw
